mapper.insert: insert into Item (item, reg_price, state, reg_id, bet_time) values (#{item}, #{regPrice}, #{state}, #{regId}, #{betTime})
mapper.select: select item_no, item, reg_date, upt_date, reg_price, state, reg_id, bet_time, is_bid from Item where item_no = #{itemNo}
select i.item_no, MAX(a.reg_date) last_tick from Item i LEFT JOIN Auction a ON i.item_no = a.item_no where i.state = 'ONSALE' and TIMESTAMPADD(day, #{addDay}, i.upt_date) < NOW() GROUP BY i.item_no
